letter_name_to_midi_note.name: letter_name_to_midi_note
letter_name_to_midi_note.description: Converts a letter name to its corresponding MIDI note. The letter name is represented in standard pitch notation. Examples are "A5", "Db3", "C#7". Refer to <a href="https://i.imgur.com/qGQgmYr.png">this mapping from letter name to midi notes.

midi_note_to_letter_name.name: midi_note_to_letter_name
midi_note_to_letter_name.description: Convert a MIDI note into its letter representation

midi_note_to_frequency.name: midi_note_to_frequency
midi_note_to_frequency.description: Converts a MIDI note to its corresponding frequency.

letter_name_to_frequency.name: letter_name_to_frequency
letter_name_to_frequency.description: Converts a letter name to its corresponding frequency.

major_scale.name: major_scale
major_scale.description: Generate a list of MIDI notes representing the major scale for the given key (including the octave)

dorian_scale.name: dorian_scale
dorian_scale.description: Generate a list of MIDI notes representing the dorian scale for the given key (including the octave)

mixolydian_scale.name: mixolydian_scale
mixolydian_scale.description: Generate a list of MIDI notes representing the mixolydian scale for the given key (including the octave)
